Class twitter4j.AsyncTwitter

Added Methods
void existsBlockAsync(String, TwitterListener) Tests if a friendship exists between two users.
void getBlockingUsersAsync(int, TwitterListener) Returns a list of user objects that the authenticating user is blocking.
void getBlockingUsersAsync(TwitterListener) Returns a list of user objects that the authenticating user is blocking.
void getBlockingUsersIDsAsync(TwitterListener) Returns an array of numeric user ids the authenticating user is blocking.
 

Changed Methods
void unblockAsync(String) Now deprecated.
 Use destroyBlockAsync(String id, TwitterListener listener) instead
void updateLocationAsync(String, TwitterListener) Now deprecated.
 Use updateProfileAsync(String name, String email, String url, String location, String description, TwitterListener listener) instead
void getRepliesAsync(TwitterListener) Now deprecated.
 Use getMentionsAsync(TwitterListener listener) instead
void leaveAsync(String) Now deprecated.
 Use disableNotificationAsync(String id) instead
void updateAsync(String, long) Now deprecated.
 Use updateStatusAsync(String status, long inReplyToStatusId) instead
void updateAsync(String, long, TwitterListener) Now deprecated.
 Use updateStatusAsync(String status, long inReplyToStatusId, TwitterListener listener) instead
 

Changed Fields
int GET_DOWNTIME_SCHEDULE Now deprecated.
 not supported by Twitter API anymore
